name: Engines
overview: "Engines" is a game in the Gravity Force-genre. Other games in that genre is e.g. Turbo Rakketti, Gravity Force II, Roketz and Bratwürst. You have a space-ship. Gravity pulls the ship downwards. By rotating the ship and using the engine you can navigate through the 2-dimensional landscape. Add cannons and another player, and presto, you've got a shoot'em up-game.
